segments.text: Hello . I am Bili and I made an appointment with you to see the house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to meet you . This way , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The house is a little too old .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's quite convenient for you to go to any part of the city . The subway is nearby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . That's why I like the house .
segments.speaker: S1
